title: H3 failure linked to payload fairing separation anomaly
description:
An H3 launch failure in December may have been caused by an unusual event that led to the satellite separating from the rocket prematurely.

The post H3 failure linked to payload fairing separation anomaly appeared first on SpaceNews.
content:
